由题意知


$$
hint = n+ noise(p+q) + noise^2
$$

$$
hint - n = noise\times (p+q+noise)
$$



求出`hint - n`，到factordb能查到noise

```py
# python3.11.4
from Crypto.Util.number import *

n = 
e = 65537
c = 
hint = 

# print(hint - n)
noise = 942430120937
p_plus_q = (hint - n - noise**2) // noise
phi = n + 1 - p_plus_q
d = inverse(e,phi)
m = pow(c,d,n)
print(long_to_bytes(m))
# LitCTF{db6f52b9265971910b306754b9df8b76}
```
